eg.syntax

Interface Highlighter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSSHighlighter, HTMLHighlighter, JavaHighlighter, JavascriptHighlighter, PerlHighlighter, PHPHighlighter, PythonHighlighter, RHighlighter, XMLHighlighter

    public interface Highlighter
    The interface to highlight text elements

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void highlight(SyntaxHighlighter.SyntaxSearcher s, Attributes attr)
      Highlights text elements
      boolean isValid(java.lang.String text, int pos, int length, int condition)
      Returns if a text element found by SyntaxSearcher is valid.

    • Method Detail

      • highlight

        void highlight(SyntaxHighlighter.SyntaxSearcher s,
               Attributes attr)
        Highlights text elements
        Parameters:
        s - the SyntaxHighlighter.SyntaxSearcher
        attr - the Attributes

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(java.lang.String text,
                int pos,
                int length,
                int condition)
        Returns if a text element found by SyntaxSearcher is valid. An implementation may define additional conditions that are not specified in the search methods or simpley return true
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position where a text element is found
        length - the length of the text element
        condition - a switch for conditions which an implementation may ignore
        Returns:
        true if valid, false otherwise
